name: Verify error handling when invalid data is entered in the Name field
description: Verify that the payment form correctly handles invalid name inputs with appropriate error messages.
descriptionHtml: Verify that the payment form correctly handles invalid name inputs with appropriate error messages.

testStage.description: Verify that the payment form correctly handles invalid name inputs with appropriate error messages.

steps.name: Given  I am on the coffee cart menu page
When  I select an Espresso drink
Click on cup with title: Espresso
And  I proceed to the payment modal
Then  I verify emptiness of 'Name' and 'Password' fields:
Then  I check that payment modal is visible
And  I check that validation message appear
